00064 class NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o : public NTBP_multi_current_o {
00065 public:
00066 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/
00067 NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o(NTreal area /* in muMeter^2 */,
00068                                                                          NTreal density = 55 /* in num/muMeter^2 */,
00069                                                                          NTreal channelConductance = 14.8e-9, /* in mSiemens per channel = 14.8 at 24 C (Colbert & Johnston (1996))*/
00070                                                                          NTreal vBase = -63/* in mV */
00071                                                                      );
00072 NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o(const NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o & original);
00073 const NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o & operator= (const NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o & right);
00074 virtual ~NTBP_colbert_axonal_sodium_multi_current_o();
00075 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00077 NTreal ComputeChannelStateTimeConstant() const;
00078 NTreturn StepCurrent();
00079 NTreal OpenChannels() const;
00080 NTreal ComputeConductance();
00081 void ComputeRateConstants(NTreal vM /* in mV */);
00082 void ShowChannelStatePopulation() { channelsPtr->ShowStates(); }
00083 void Show() {  cout << " alphaM= " << alphaM << "\t betaM= " << betaM << "\t openRatio= " << ((double)channelsPtr->NumOpen())/channelsPtr->_numChannels()
00084                    << "\t alphaH= " << alphaH << "\t betaH= " << betaH << "\t openNum= " << channelsPtr->NumOpen();}
00086 NTreal AlphaM(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return 0.182*(vM+46.5)/(1.0-exp((-vM-46.5)/6.0));}
00088 NTreal BetaM(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return 0.124*(-vM-46.5)/(1.0-exp((vM+46.5)/6.0));}
00090 NTreal AlphaH(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {  vM += _vBase(); return -0.015*(vM+69.0)/(1.0-exp((vM+69.0)/6.0));}
00092 NTreal BetaH(NTreal vM /* in mV */) {   vM += _vBase(); return -0.015*(-vM-69.0)/(1.0-exp((-vM-69.0)/6.0));}
00094 void ShowParam() const;
00095 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00096 protected:
00097 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00098 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00099 private:
00100 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00101 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00102 static NT_gaussian_rnd_dist_o normalRnd; // notice, sometimes a linker error is produced, which can be removed by adding a NT_gaussian_..._o object at the beginning of the main() code.
00103 
00104 static bool initTableLookUp;
00105 
00106 NTreal baseTemp; // C
00107 NTreal alphaM;
00108 NTreal betaM;
00109 NTreal m;
00110 NTreal noiseM;
00111 static NTreal alphaMvec[15000];
00112 static NTreal betaMvec[15000];
00113 NTreal q10m;
00114 
00115 NTreal alphaH;
00116 NTreal betaH;
00117 NTreal h;
00118 NTreal noiseH;
00119 static NTreal alphaHvec[15000];
00120 static NTreal betaHvec[15000];
00121 NTreal q10h;
00122 };
